Judge orders menacing dog destroyed after unprovoked attack on Wellington street https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/judge-orders-menacing-dog-destroyed-after-unprovoked-attack-on-wellington-street/OSGKVKYQERAFLGYILPNAOMLAHM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/judge-orders-menacing-dog-destroyed-after-unprovoked-attack-on-wellington-street/OSGKVKYQERAFLGYILPNAOMLAHM/ Catherine HuttonThe dog was already on a short leash when he attacked a stranger.Mon, 12 Aug 2024 05:32:36 +0000 A judge has now ordered Reign, an American Pitbull terrier cross, be put down. Photo / Supplied.
Driver admits causing the death of off-duty Northland policewoman https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/driver-admits-causing-the-death-of-off-duty-northland-policewoman/GKOKUASGDFDANMFZ6GJS45A5CA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/driver-admits-causing-the-death-of-off-duty-northland-policewoman/GKOKUASGDFDANMFZ6GJS45A5CA/ Guilty driver had unregistered, unwarranted vehicle, and had consumed beer and cannabis Mon, 12 Aug 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Kieron James Wihongi-Henare, 32, has admitted reckless driving causing the death of off-duty policewoman Gail Shepherd. Photo/ Facebook
Kaimai Range: State Highway 29 eastbound lane blocked by car fire https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/kaimai-range-state-highway-29-eastbound-lane-blocked-by-car-fire/GLUN52SFI5GRDN6CXNZYX2QV3A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/kaimai-range-state-highway-29-eastbound-lane-blocked-by-car-fire/GLUN52SFI5GRDN6CXNZYX2QV3A/ Maryana GarciaA Fire and Emergency spokesperson said the fire was reported at about 2.56pm. Mon, 12 Aug 2024 04:44:01 +0000 Fire and Emergency services received reports of a car fire on State Highway 29 at about 2.56pm.
Body found in search for missing Gisborne 5-year-old Kaizer https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/search-for-kaizer-gisborne-boy-with-autism-bad-weather-could-hinder-efforts/NJWCLWI6PRGUZPGKMYZHDML3TY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/search-for-kaizer-gisborne-boy-with-autism-bad-weather-could-hinder-efforts/NJWCLWI6PRGUZPGKMYZHDML3TY/ Raphael Franks, Murray RobertsonThe extensive search started Sunday afternoon and continued through the night into today. Mon, 12 Aug 2024 04:37:52 +0000 Video from the search showed teams in wetsuits wading through rivers, tossing away debris and feeling along the riverbed. A helicopter can also be seen scouring the area from above. Photo / Murray Roberston
Jo Sione-Lauaki: Death of Dargaville woman found on beach still unexplained https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/jo-sione-lauaki-death-of-dargaville-woman-found-on-beach-still-unexplained/RH554UFF2ZGI3A2ERU7BVLWRIM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/jo-sione-lauaki-death-of-dargaville-woman-found-on-beach-still-unexplained/RH554UFF2ZGI3A2ERU7BVLWRIM/ Police still hope someone will shed light on what happened before Dargaville woman found. Mon, 12 Aug 2024 04:30:26 +0000 Jo Sione-Lauaki and Jared Sione-Lauaki. Jo was found dead on Omamari Beach in Northland on August 2 in circumstances police have described as "unexplained".
MetService issues severe weather alerts: ‘Southerly buster’ sweeps New Zealand, temperatures to drop https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/metservice-issues-severe-weather-alerts-southerly-buster-sweeps-new-zealand-Temperatures-to-drop/WP6DUJRUEBC55DKAGR2YPGMC6I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/metservice-issues-severe-weather-alerts-southerly-buster-sweeps-new-zealand-Temperatures-to-drop/WP6DUJRUEBC55DKAGR2YPGMC6I/ Raphael FranksSevere weather alerts have been issued along the East Coast. Mon, 12 Aug 2024 04:19:26 +0000 Severe thunder and hail storms have been forecasted for Gisborne, for between 5pm and midnight today; and in Tararua, Wairarapa, Wellington, Marlborough and Canterbury from now to 7pm. Photo / MetService
The Feelers’ lead singer James Reid sentenced after third drink-driving conviction https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-feelers-lead-singer-james-reid-reveals-battle-against-alcoholism-after-third-drink-driven-conviction/KQI2ZX5HI5ED5HXR44OINH366M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-feelers-lead-singer-james-reid-reveals-battle-against-alcoholism-after-third-drink-driven-conviction/KQI2ZX5HI5ED5HXR44OINH366M/ Anna LeaskJames Reid has been sentenced for refusing a blood test. Mon, 12 Aug 2024 04:08:40 +0000 The Feelers frontman James Reid has been in residential treatment for alcoholism. He was sentenced in the Christchurch District Court today for his third drink-driving-related offence. Photo / George Heard
